org.springframework.integration.dsl.amqp

Class AmqpMessageChannelSpec<S extends AmqpMessageChannelSpec<S>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.springframework.integration.dsl.core.IntegrationComponentSpec<S,C>
      • org.springframework.integration.dsl.channel.MessageChannelSpec<S,org.springframework.integration.amqp.channel.AbstractAmqpChannel>
        • org.springframework.integration.dsl.amqp.AmqpPollableMessageChannelSpec<S>
          • org.springframework.integration.dsl.amqp.AmqpMessageChannelSpec<S>
  • Type Parameters:
    S - the target AmqpMessageChannelSpec implementation type.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.springframework.beans.factory.FactoryBean<org.springframework.integration.amqp.channel.AbstractAmqpChannel>, ComponentsRegistration
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AmqpPublishSubscribeMessageChannelSpec

    public class AmqpMessageChannelSpec<S extends AmqpMessageChannelSpec<S>>
extends AmqpPollableMessageChannelSpec<S>
    An AmqpPollableMessageChannelSpec for a message-driven PointToPointSubscribableAmqpChannel.
    Author:
    Artem Bilan, Gary Russell
